name: Quad Lateral
description:
Welcome to Quad Lateral, a vertical platformer where the only mechanic is... jumping. Multiple times. Repeatedly. Upwards. All so that you can reach the top of the highest tower in the world and claim the greatest view ever.

Git repo at https://github.com/shuttler76/Quad-Lateral

====================
CONTROLS
===================
LEFT/RIGHT or A/D to MOVE
UP/W to JUMP
SHIFT to GRAB WALLS

...yeah, that's it. So what?
